comments:
CDO v1.0.0 RC9 on Callisto final version.
After having installed callisto I installed CDO and restarted. The menu entry "CDO Test" showed up however when I ran the "create library CDO resource" action, I got the following stack trace in my console:

CDO is client/server based. I assume that you forgot (probably due to missing documentation) to start the server instance. Please have a look at the newsgroup posting http://www.eclipse.org/newsportal/article.php?id=646&group=eclipse.technology.emft#646 to get an idea what you have to do to start a database and a CDO server instance.

Proper documentation will follow soon...
